description: Housed in a restored hay barn on the edge of the village, this charming rustic restaurant offers traditional cuisine with a modern twist, a good selection of wine and an excellent choice of beer. Every week, the menu features five records which played a major role in the history of music or which represent an important moment in time for the restaurant owner.
